Blacknightmare/Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite:
 
Blacknightmare was in conference room of Blackfortress when she 
recive the new that a pod was on line in somewhere, she opened her 
comm link to the LAdies and said "Aelo, Celeno and Ocipite -go to 
follow coordinates and take that pod for Black Fortres"
 
The Ladies left the BlackFortress and flew towards the pod while 
Blacknightmare looking to Orchestra and Ender "Our Objective will be 
destroy a faction but we have to be sure that Alliance doesn't 
support them and Destron support us... Any sugestion to get that?"
 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "The Social Disease" <thesocialdisease@h...> 
wrote:
> A black stasis pod partially stuck in the earth suddenly activated, 
its

and the pod
